subject: Football
lead_paragraph: KEVIN CURTIS AND BRIAN WESTBROOK Curtis, left, had 221 yards receiving and 3 scores and Westbrook had 110 yards rushing, 111 receiving and 3 scores as the Eagles beat the Lions.
snippet: KEVIN CURTIS AND BRIAN WESTBROOK Curtis, left, had 221 yards receiving and 3 scores and Westbrook had 110 yards rushing, 111 receiving and 3 scores as the Eagles beat the Lions.
